---
date: "2021-01-01"
title: "AD Son Sardina"
subtitle: 'Primera Nacional'
summary: 'Primera Nacional'
---
```{r, traj, fig.width=8, fig.height=4, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(ggplot2))
traj <- read.csv('~/Google Drive/Futbol/futstat_trajs.csv') %>% filter(team == '/Son-Sardina-Femenino') %>% filter(date > as.Date('2021-08-01'))
if (nrow(traj) > 2){
  table <- read.csv('~/Google Drive/Futbol/futstat_tables.csv') %>% filter(league == 'segunda_division_femenina_3')
  league <- read.csv('~/Google Drive/Futbol/ligas.csv') %>% filter(league == 'segunda_division_femenina' & group == 3)
  t1.line <- (table$pts[league$t1.max] + table$pts[league$t1.max+1])/2
  t2.line <- (table$pts[league$t2.max] + table$pts[league$t2.max+1])/2
  des.line <- (table$pts[league$des.min] + table$pts[league$des.min-1])/2
  suppressWarnings(p <- ggplot(data=traj) + geom_line(aes(date,pts, group = 1), size = 1.5, color = '#f66f5c') + geom_line(aes(date,qualitat, group = 1), size = 1, color = '#f66f5c', alpha = .1, linetype = 'dashed') + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=t1.line), linetype='dashed', color='#5c5c5c') + annotate('text',0,t1.line,label = 'Campió', vjust = -.5, hjust = 'left', color='#5c5c5c') + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=t2.line), linetype='dashed', color='#5c5c5c') + annotate('text',0,t2.line,label = 'NA', vjust = -.5, hjust = 'left', color='#5c5c5c') + geom_hline(aes(yintercept=des.line), linetype='dashed', color='#5c5c5c') + annotate('text',0,des.line,label = 'Descens', vjust = -.5, hjust = 'left', color='#5c5c5c'))
  suppressWarnings(p + theme_minimal() + labs(x = NULL, y = "Punts Projectats") + theme(axis.text.x=element_blank()))
}
```
 
### Classificació projectada
```{r, hist, fig.width=8, fig.height=3, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
hist <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/futstat_hists.csv") %>% filter(team == '/Son-Sardina-Femenino')
p <- ggplot(hist, aes(as.factor(rank))) + geom_bar(fill = "#f66f5c")
p + theme_minimal() + labs(y = "Simulacions", x = "Classificació") + theme(axis.text.y=element_blank())
```
